vlive.korean: [대안 없이는 죽어도 못 보내] 대안도 없이 이걸 무작정 졸업한다고 그러면... You can't just graduate from it without any alternative. 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) 1회 - 박지훈, 저장&윙크로부터 졸업!
vlive.english: You can't just graduate from it without any alternative.

vlive.korean: 규리는 이번 주 라면을 먹었다 대 안 먹었다 뭐야~ Did Gyuri eat ramen this week or didn't she? What? 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 🎊fromis_9 1st BIRTHDAY PARTY🎊
vlive.english: Did Gyuri eat ramen this week or didn't she? What?

vlive.korean: 대안이 있군요? They have alternatives? 듣기 View video 10PM : 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 A night's entertainment news
뭔가 대안이 필요해. I need to think of a solution. 듣기 View video iKON : 날씨 너무 좋다~
vlive.english: I need to think of a solution.

vlive.korean: 그래? - 안 한 대, 안 한 대. Really? - They don't do it. They don't do it. 듣기 View video BTOB : MC 성재의 <집사부일체> 대기실 V 라이브!
vlive.english: Really? - They don't do it. They don't do it.

examples.korean: The only practicable alternative is to postpone the meeting. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 실행 가능한 유일한 대안은 회의를 연기하는 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The only practicable alternative is to postpone the meeting. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Community service is seen as the only credible alternative to imprisonment. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사회봉사가 수감을 대체할, 유일하게 받아들일 만한 대안으로 보인다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Community service is seen as the only credible alternative to imprisonment. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There is no viable alternative. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 실행 가능한 다른 대안이 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There is no viable alternative. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Do you have an alternative solution? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대안이 될 다른 해결책이 있나요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Do you have an alternative solution? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We had no alternative but to fire Gibson. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 깁슨을 해고할 밖에 다른 대안이 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We had no alternative but to fire Gibson. Add to Wordbook
